message.body: Hey I got my cap and gown but wasn't able to get extra tickets today. They said they will post a date and you gotta come back with the reciept and you ca
n get extra tickets. Problem is they only give you 2 extra. I need 3 extra. Do you mind picking up extra tickets for me when the day comes? That's if y
ou don't need the extra tickets yourself of course.
Wait. Extra tickets on top of the 4? Or they only give you 2 free tickets?
They give you an initial 4 free tickets. And at another date you can get 2 free exta tickets.
Ah. So you need 1 extra ticket (from me) after you get your extra 2?
I'm kinda confused as to what you're asking, lol
Yeah cause I need 7 tickets total
What time did you get there? I was thinking about going at 11, but decided not to.
So I have 4 now. Gonna pick up 2 later with my reciept. And need one from you if you don't need the extra ticket
I went at 1030. You should set aside like half an hour. The line was a little slow when I was there
I might not be able to give you the extra ticket. Seems like my friends wanna come to my graduation. I'm not sure yet though.
Ok let me know as soon as you know for sure. Ill keep asking around
